files.README.md:
# codingagents

Claude Code plugins by newink for coding agents.

## Plugins

### claudecode-sounds

Play sounds when Claude Code needs your attention.

## Installation

```bash
# Add this marketplace
/plugin marketplace add newink/codingagents

# Install a plugin
/plugin install claudecode-sounds@codingagents
```

plugins.name: claudecode-sounds
plugins.description: Play sounds when Claude Code needs your attention
